title: jaya shrI rAmakrSNa
sahitya:
jaya shrI rAmakrSNa dEvA jaya jaya sadguru nAthA


anupallavi

  maDiyAl miDiyuNDu vADum kuvalayam dayavAl uyirt-tOngat-tazhaittiDu mukhilE


caraNam    shAntam vaDiyum un sannidhi vandadum sandEham sancalam shAmbarAip-pOyina 
kAnti shuDar viDum karuNA rUpanE kai koDuttengaLaik-karaiyETrum ayyanE
